message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its worth to you.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000. This is a fair price considering your own valuation of the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $13,000 is cutting it a bit close for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
